description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fqtvh","text":"This protocol confirms knockdown of individual genes from CRISPRi sgRNAs using RT-qPCR. Details below specifically validate gene knockdown of complex subunits within the electron transport chain in K562 cells.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text:

related_materials.name: Human ACTB (Beta Actin) Endogenous Control (VIC™/MGB probe, primer limited)

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"o30q","text":"Collect cell pellet, wash cells in cold PBS (For K562 cells, optimized cell number is 100.000). Place cells on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5esjm","text":"For each reaction, prepare 0.5 μL DNase I with 49.5 μL of Lysis solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4flsj","text":"Add 50 μL of Lysis solution containing DNase I to cell pellet. Mix by pipetting up and down (avoid bubble). Incubate at RT for 5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f4d1g","text":"Pipette 5 μL of Stop solution into each reaction. Mix by pipetting up and down (avoid bubble). Incubate at RT for 2 min.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5ira","text":"Use sample for reverse transcription reaction or store at -20oC. Do not keep sample at RT for longer than 20 min.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":61,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t5gg","text":" Prepare 40 μL of master mix for each reaction, place on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2btqj","text":"25 μL 2X RT Buffer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mh64","text":"2.5 μL 20X RT Enzyme Mix","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blchn","text":"12.5 μL Nuclease-free Wate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6arho","text":"Add 10 μL of cell lysis sample to each reaction. (can scale up or scale down depending on cell number, but the total volume of cell lysis sample cannot exceed 22.5 μL).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fd29t","text":"Program thermal cycler for standard reverse transcription cycle (37°C for 6 minutes, followed by 95°C for 5 minutes and holding at 4°C).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ep95o","text":"Prepare 16 μL PCR cocktail master mix for each reaction, place on ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"38agi","text":"10 μL TaqMan Gene Expression Master Mix (2X)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmht","text":"1 μL TaqMan Gene Expression Assay (20X)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dmju","text":"5 μL Nuclease-free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sslp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ifip","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ru2o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1h2su","text":"Keep primers away from direct light since they are all light-sensitive. Thaw primers on ice and cover with foil.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"51gps","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9u9am","text":"Pipette PCR cocktail master mix to 386-well plate, add samples from RT reaction (4 μL each), avoid bubble. Put plate on ice if this process takes a long time.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmhfq","text":"Cover plate with clear plastic sticker. Spin down the plate briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e21lt","text":"Use standard Real-time PCR program (UDG incubation of 50°C for 2 minutes, enzyme activation at 95°C for 10 minutes, and PCR cycles of 95°C for 15 seconds, 60°C for 1 minute, repeated for 40 cycles).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ea4sd","text":"After run is complete, calculate fold changes in expression using the 2-ΔΔCTmethod.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":71,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
